a large city in northern England: He was born in Leeds, an industrial city in West Yorkshire, in 1981.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was speaking from her home in Leeds.He had moved to Leeds almost a year before.We travelled from Leeds to York by train.I studied at Leeds University.
